page.title: 02Corfe Mullen in general
page.content:
{Corfe Mullen}was once said to be the second largest village in Europe.Today it is a thriving residential area, serving the Bournemouth and Poole areas.Most of Corfe Mullen is recent,built within the last 20 years.
Construction of estates has slowed, although a few homes and other facilities are still being built.
The main cultural,commercial and sporting centres are to be found in nearby Bournemouth and Poole,but many businesses have relocated to the cheaper land of the outer suburbs. These are mainly service industries.
